nodes.text: A Trip to the Light Side

A Trip to the Light Side is an interview with Joel Aron, the CG effects supervisor of Star Wars: The Clone Wars and Star Wars Rebels. It was conducted by Jonathan Wilkins and published in Star Wars Insider 152. The article was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016.

Aron discusses working in a variety of capacities with people including David Meyers, Sean Wells, Liz Cummings, Athena Yvette Portillo, Dave Filoni, Roger Christian, Jonathan W. Rinzler, Kilian Plunkett, Ralph McQuarrie, Ben Burtt, and, of course, George Lucas.
